entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. A few flurries beginning after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 11 in the morning then rising.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late in the morning then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 11 in the morning then rising. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023
